name: Photobooth
body:
### Manuite's photobooth.
This is my little contribution to [this script](http://tutorialzine.com/2011/04/jquery-webcam-photobooth/). It mimics osx's photobooth with the implementation of five different masks.

![pic](http://f.cl.ly/items/2d090b0s3h3J3i3I3q26/Capture%20d’écran%202012-09-12%20à%2018.54.32.png)

### Todo
All you have to do after cloning is create a 777 chmoded "uploads" directory at root level.

```
$ cd Sites
$ git clone git://github.com/Manuite/photobooth.git
$ cd photobooth
$ mkdir uploads
$ chmod 777 uploads
```

There you go! Have a simply **super** day!
